full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG BSKANG GSO CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @024A *, ,(MYUR MDZAD MGON PO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB CING GTOR MA 'BUL BA'I RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG GIS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING, RGYUD SDE DANG MI MTHUN PA'I LOG CHOS MANG POS MA BSLAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING CHA TSANG BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, MANG DU THOS PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS GNOD SBYIN GANG BA BZANG PO'I GANGS MGUL DBEN GNAS RIN CHEN 'BAR BA'I SDINGS SU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
